title: IOCL Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 537 Apprentice Posts
description: The Indian Oil Corporation Limited (IOCL) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 537 Technician Apprentice, Trade Apprentice, and Data Entry Operator Jobs. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their ITI, 12th, Diploma, B.E./B. Tech in Electronics, Mechanical Engineering can apply for the IOCL Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in onl...
